description: The classic and timelessly elegant Ma.Ri.Na restaurant has been a bastion for fish and seafood enthusiasts for decades. The menu features classic Italian specialities alongside more creative options, including a good selection of raw dishes as well as delicious seafood pastas and risottos. The wine list is also impressive and includes an array of wines by the glass.
